---
title: Extrapyramidal Tracts
---


There are 4 extrapyramidal tracts:

- [Rubrospinal Tract]({{< var ref-rubrospinal-tract.path >}}) @blumenfeldNeuroanatomyClinicalCases2022
- [Vestibulospinal tracts (VSTs)]({{< var ref-vestibulospinal-tract.path >}}) @blumenfeldNeuroanatomyClinicalCases2022
    - [Medial VST]({{< var ref-vestibulospinal-tract.medial >}}) @blumenfeldNeuroanatomyClinicalCases2022
    - [Lateral VST]({{< var ref-vestibulospinal-tract.lateral >}})  @blumenfeldNeuroanatomyClinicalCases2022
- [Reticulospinal tracts]({{< var ref-reticulospinal-tract.path >}})  @blumenfeldNeuroanatomyClinicalCases2022
- [Tectospinal tracts]({{< var ref-tectospinal-tract.path >}}) @blumenfeldNeuroanatomyClinicalCases2022

:::{.callout-note}
All of these tracts besides the Rubrospinal tract are [medial motor systems]({{< var ref-medial-motor-systems.path >}}) @blumenfeldNeuroanatomyClinicalCases2022
:::
